products.name: Organic Original Pretzel Crisps
products.facts: ["Made with organic ingredients, ensuring no synthetic pesticides or fertilizers are used.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to minimize environmental impact.","Produced using a baking process that uses less energy compared to frying.","Certified organic, meeting strict USDA standards for quality and sustainability."]

products.name: Natural Creamy Peanut Butter
products.categories: Plant-based foods,Legumes and their products,Spreads,Nuts and their products,Plant-based spreads,Sweet spreads,Oilseed purees,Legume butters,Nut butters,Peanut butters
products.labels: high sodiumlevel,high saturated fats,low cholesterol,no trans fats,high potassium,High proteins, No GMOs, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Made from 100% roasted peanuts with no added sugars or hydrogenated oils.","The peanuts used are often sourced from sustainable farms that prioritize eco-friendly practices.","Natural Creamy Peanut Butter is rich in protein and healthy fats, making it a nutritious choice.","The product is typically packaged in recyclable materials, reducing environmental impact."]

products.name: Daisy pure & natural sour cream
products.categories: Dairies, Fermented foods, Fermented milk products, Creams, Fermented creams, Sour creams
products.facts: ["Made from 100% natural ingredients without artificial additives or preservatives.","Daisy sour cream is gluten-free, making it suitable for those with gluten sensitivities.","The packaging is designed to be recyclable, promoting environmental sustainability.","Daisy prioritizes high-quality dairy sourced from American farms, ensuring freshness and taste."]

products.name: 7 Sprouted Grains Bread
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Breads
products.labels: Organic, Kosher, No GMOs, No preservatives, USDA Organic, Non glyphosate
products.facts: ["Made with a blend of seven sprouted whole grains for enhanced nutrition.","Uses organic ingredients, promoting sustainable farming practices.","Free from artificial preservatives and additives, ensuring natural quality.","Rich in fiber and protein, contributing to a balanced diet."]

products.name: Organic Raw Cane Sugar
products.labels: Organic, Vegetarian, USDA Organic, Vegan, en:non-gmo-project
products.facts: ["Organic raw cane sugar is made from the juice of sugarcane plants that are cultivated without synthetic pesticides or fertilizers.","It is minimally processed, retaining more of the natural molasses and nutrients compared to refined sugars.","The production of organic raw cane sugar supports sustainable farming practices that promote biodiversity and soil health.","It is often packaged in eco-friendly materials, reducing environmental impact compared to conventional sugar packaging."]

products.name: Panda Brand Oyster Sauce
products.facts: ["Panda Brand Oyster Sauce is made from high-quality oyster extract, sugar, and salt.","The product is packaged in a recyclable glass bottle, promoting eco-friendliness.","Panda Brand prioritizes using natural ingredients without artificial preservatives.","The sauce is known for its rich umami flavor, enhancing the quality of various dishes."]

products.name: Pepsi
products.facts: ["Pepsi's 12 oz can is made from aluminum, which is 100% recyclable and can be recycled indefinitely without loss of quality.","The production of a single aluminum can requires 95% less energy than creating a new can from raw materials.","Pepsi has committed to reducing its greenhouse gas emissions by 20% by 2030 as part of its sustainability goals.","The beverage is produced using high-quality ingredients, including carbonated water, high fructose corn syrup, and natural flavors."]

products.name: Vanilla Greek Yogurt
products.categories: Dairies, Fermented foods, Desserts, Fermented milk products, Dairy desserts, Fermented dairy desserts, Yogurts, Vanilla yogurt, Greek-style yogurts
products.facts: ["Made from high-quality milk sourced from local dairy farms.","Contains live probiotic cultures that promote gut health.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Free from artificial flavors and preservatives, ensuring natural quality."]

products.name: Thai Noodles Satay sauce
products.facts: ["Made from natural ingredients including peanuts, coconut milk, and spices.","Contains no artificial preservatives or colors, ensuring a healthier option.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","Produced under quality control standards to guarantee consistency and taste."]

products.name: 95% de sorbete de limón con un 5% de preparado de limón
products.categories: Desserts,Frozen foods,Frozen desserts,Ice creams and sorbets,Sorbets,Lemon sorbets
products.labels: Vegetarian,Vegan,Made in Belgium,Made in the EU
products.facts: ["Composed of 95% lemon sorbet and 5% lemon preparation, ensuring a refreshing taste.","The packaging is designed to be recyclable, promoting environmental sustainability.","Made with natural ingredients, free from artificial preservatives and colors, enhancing quality.","Produced using eco-friendly practices to minimize carbon footprint during manufacturing."]

["Variables can be constructed from a range of materials including metals, plastics, and organic compounds.","In ecology, variables can represent factors such as temperature, humidity, and species diversity that influence ecosystems.","The quality of a variable is often assessed based on its reliability, validity, and precision in measurement.","In programming, the choice of variable type can affect memory usage and processing speed, impacting overall performance."]
